mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_order ( id , user_id, start_time , create_time , expect_time , order_status , order_type , weight , quantity , scheme , total_price ) VALUES (#{orderId},#{userId},now(),now(),#{expectTime},#{orderStatus},#{orderType},#{weight},#{quantity},#{scheme},#{totalPrice});
mapper.select: SELECT id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, start_time AS startTime, create_time AS createTime, expect_time AS expectTime, order_status AS orderStatus, order_type AS orderType, weight AS weight, quantity AS quantity, scheme AS scheme, total_price AS totalPrice FROM m_order WHERE id = #{orderId};

SELECT id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, start_time AS startTime, create_time AS createTime, expect_time AS expectTime, order_status AS orderStatus, order_type AS orderType, weight AS weight, quantity AS quantity, scheme AS scheme, total_price AS totalPrice FROM m_order ORDER BY create_time DESC;
